summary: Detailed implementation plan for Chapter 8 (Hinductor & Magnetic Light) featuring new nanobrain_hinductor module with Hinductor class for vortex-based resistance, MagneticKnotGenerator for knot patterns, TomaschOscillator for noise-to-signal conversion, PhaseSpace for 12-blinking-hole dynamics, and MagnonicBridge for electron-to-magnon transitions. Includes verification via existing demo programs and new unit tests.
